es.title: Perfecto para vacaciones en familia
es.comment: Instalaciones limpias. El personal del resort es muy atento y servicial. Acceso fácil a todo. ¡Nos encantó la habitación, amplia y cómoda, El personal del resort es muy atento y servicial. en.title: Great for family vacation
en.comment: Clean facilities. Resort staff is very knowledgeable and accommodating! Easy access to Disney World. We especially loved the room, which was spacious and comfortable. My family and I will certainly return soon!
en.author: ERIC H.

en.title: Excellent experience
en.comment: From check-in to check-out everything was great. Highly recommend.
en.author: SUSAN M.
